decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning from 27.11.2020. Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 and Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in complete accordance with the approved plans and drawings listed in this decision notice, other than where those details are altered pursuant to the conditions of this planning permission.  Reason:  For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

All new external work and finishes and work of making good shall match the existing adjacent original work in respect of the methods used, materials, colour, texture, profile, and finished appearance, except where indicated otherwise on the drawings hereby approved, or unless otherwise required by condition. Reason:  To conserve the significance methods used and special interest of the Listed Building (policies Q11 and Q20 of the London Borough of Lambeth Local Plan (2021)).
description: Variation of conditions 2(Approved Plans) and 3(Materials) of planning permission 20/01860/FUL (Erection of a single storey extension to the existing vehicle repair garage and the formation of a vehicular crossover) granted on 27.11.2020.Variation sought: hange to the external materials as proposed, subsitute the approved brickwork with profiled aluminium sheeting.
